A

ACTION_ON_ERROR - Static variable in class handist.mpijunit.Configuration
Option defining what should be done in case the MpiRunner encounters an Exception when running the tests.
ACTION_ON_ERROR_DEFAULT - Static variable in class handist.mpijunit.Configuration
Default action for Configuration.ACTION_ON_ERROR, is Configuration.ON_ERROR_ERROR
addFirstListener(RunListener) - Method in class handist.mpijunit.ToFileRunNotifier
Unused in this implementation
addListener(RunListener) - Method in class handist.mpijunit.ToFileRunNotifier
Unused in this implementation

C

close() - Method in class handist.mpijunit.ToFileRunNotifier
Writes all the notifications received to the output stream ToFileRunNotifier.objOut, flushes it, and closes it.
Configuration - Class in handist.mpijunit
Contains various String constants used to define the behavior of the MpiRunner.
Configuration() - Constructor for class handist.mpijunit.Configuration
 

D

DRY_RUN - Static variable in class handist.mpijunit.Configuration
Command line option to choose whether the mpirun process should actually be launched.
DRY_RUN_DEFAULT - Static variable in class handist.mpijunit.Configuration
Default setting for Configuration.DRY_RUN

G

getDescription() - Method in class handist.mpijunit.MpiRunner
Creates a tree description of the tests to run.

H

handist.mpijunit - package handist.mpijunit
 
healthy() - Method in class handist.mpijunit.MpiApgasTestLauncher
Checks that all the processes launched are healthy.

J

JAVA_LIBRARY_PATH - Static variable in class handist.mpijunit.Configuration
Command line option used to define the -Djava.library.path option of the mpi process launched by the MpiRunner.

K

KEEP_NOTIFICATIONS - Static variable in class handist.mpijunit.Configuration
Command line option used to choose whether the files containing the Notifications that are made to the RunNotifier in each of the MPI processes should be kept after the tests' execution.
KEEP_NOTIFICATIONS_DEFAULT - Static variable in class handist.mpijunit.Configuration
Default setting for Configuration.KEEP_NOTIFICATIONS, is "false" .

L

launch(int, List<String>, List<String>, boolean) - Method in class handist.mpijunit.MpiApgasTestLauncher
Launches n processes with the given command line and host list.
launch(List<String>, String, boolean) - Method in class handist.mpijunit.MpiApgasTestLauncher
Launches one process with the given command line at the specified host.

M

main(String[]) - Static method in class handist.mpijunit.MpiApgasTestLauncher
Main method of the MpiApgasTestLauncher class.
main(String[]) - Static method in class handist.mpijunit.MpiTestLauncher
Main method of MpiTestLauncher
method - Variable in class handist.mpijunit.Notification
Method that was called
MPI_IMPL - Static variable in class handist.mpijunit.Configuration
Command line option to define the MPI implementation used to launch the mpi tests.
MPI_IMPL_DEFAULT - Static variable in class handist.mpijunit.Configuration
Default setting for Configuration.MPI_IMPL : "mpj-multicore"
MPI_IMPL_MPJMULTICORE - Static variable in class handist.mpijunit.Configuration
Possible option for the MPI implementation used to launch the tests.
MPI_IMPL_MPJNATIVE - Static variable in class handist.mpijunit.Configuration
Possible option for the MPI implementation used to launch the tests.
MPI_IMPL_NATIVE - Static variable in class handist.mpijunit.Configuration
Possible option for the MPI implementation used to launch the tests.
MpiApgasTestLauncher - Class in handist.mpijunit
Launcher class for tests that rely on a combination of MPI and APGAS for Java calls.
MpiApgasTestLauncher() - Constructor for class handist.mpijunit.MpiApgasTestLauncher
Constructs a new MpiApgasTestLauncher instance.
MpiConfig - Annotation Type in handist.mpijunit
Annotation used to set some environment settings for test classes that use the MpiRunner.
MPIRUN_OPTION - Static variable in class handist.mpijunit.Configuration
Settings to give options to the mpirun command when a native MPI implementation id used.
MpiRunner - Class in handist.mpijunit
Custom Junit Runner which uses MPI to run the test class it receives.
MpiRunner(Class<?>) - Constructor for class handist.mpijunit.MpiRunner
Constructor with the class to test provided as parameter
MpiTestLauncher - Class in handist.mpijunit
Default launcher for the MpiRunner.
MpiTestLauncher() - Constructor for class handist.mpijunit.MpiTestLauncher
 

N

Notification - Class in handist.mpijunit
Class used to capture the fact the ToFileRunNotifier was called.
Notification(String, Object[]) - Constructor for class handist.mpijunit.Notification
Constructor.
NOTIFICATIONS_PATH - Static variable in class handist.mpijunit.Configuration
Option to specify the directory in which the notifications of each rank will be placed.

O

ON_ERROR_ERROR - Static variable in class handist.mpijunit.Configuration
Possible setting for Configuration.ACTION_ON_ERROR, shows tests as "Error"
ON_ERROR_SILENT - Static variable in class handist.mpijunit.Configuration
Possible setting for Configuration.ACTION_ON_ERROR, does not show any result
ON_ERROR_SKIP - Static variable in class handist.mpijunit.Configuration
Possible setting for Configuration.ACTION_ON_ERROR, shows tests as "Skipped"

P

parameters - Variable in class handist.mpijunit.Notification
Parameters that were used when making the call to the notifier.
PARSE_NOTIFICATIONS - Static variable in class handist.mpijunit.Configuration
Option used to parse only the results of a single rank.

S
